channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CO
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CO

item.title: Report E-2024050331
item.description:
Report E-2024050331

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-20T15:12:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-15
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal UDV experienced a UN2922 Super Concentrated Toi-De-Fresh Lavatory Deodorant release from a 5-gallon poly pail. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup operations. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 5-gallons of product released to a 4’ x 6’ area of the concrete dock floor due to a puncture caused by a load shift. The damaged pail, impacted shrink wrap, and debris were all containerized into a 30-gallon poly drum. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.

item.title: Report X-2024050622
item.description:
Report X-2024050622

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-17T21:11:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-03
  • City: STERLING
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: BNSF RAILWAY COMPANY
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 2515
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Transloading facility Locomotive Services identified TCBX 286080 with a release and loose man way swing bolt prior to offloading and received in spur track. Locomotive Services communicated to BNSF Fueling Gary Tobin of the issue and SID contacted. HMR mobilized to secure as offloading will be in next 1-2 weeks and car required securement prior to. One man way swing bolt was found loose and completely disengaged from lid and a second was found loose.

item.title: Report I-2024050031
item.description:
Report I-2024050031

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-16T15:11:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-17
  • City: Denver
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED AIRLINES HOLDINGS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: We had some undeclared DG on AWB 016-39171775 that was caught during screening. There were 4 lithium-ion batteries found. The box this AWB was packed in has a UN3481 sticker barely visible through the blue plastic wrap; however, this was not declared on the actual AWB itself.
